005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IConfiguration;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IMutableConfiguration;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractModuleLoader;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext.IModuleLoaderStrategy;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.SimpleModuleLoaderStrategy;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.codegen.DefaultModuleBindingGenerator;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.DeserializationFeature;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.IBoundLoader;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.IBoundDefinitionModelAssembly;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.METASCHEMA;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.METASCHEMA.Import;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.MetaschemaModelModule;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.impl.BindingModule;
024
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.net.URI;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.Map;
029import java.util.stream.Collectors;
030
031import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
032import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
033
034/**
035 * A module loader implementation that parses Metaschema modules from a
036 * specified resource using the built-in model {@link MetaschemaModelModule}
037 * binding.
038 * <p>
039 * Metaschema modules loaded this way are automatically registered with the
040 * {@link IBindingContext}.
041 * <p>
042 * Use of this Metaschema module loader requires that the associated binding
043 * context is initialized using a {@link IModuleLoaderStrategy} that supports
044 * dynamic bound module loading. This can be accomplished using the
045 * {@link SimpleModuleLoaderStrategy} initialized using the
046 * {@link DefaultModuleBindingGenerator}.
047 */
048public class BindingModuleLoader
049    extends AbstractModuleLoader<METASCHEMA, IBindingMetaschemaModule>
050    implements IBindingModuleLoader {
051  private final Lazy<IBoundLoader> loader;
052  private final ModuleLoadingPostProcessor postProcessor;
053
054  /**
055   * Construct a new Metaschema loader.
056   *
057   * @param bindingContext
058   *          the Metaschema binding context used to load bound resources
059   * @param postProcessor
060   *          the post processor to use when after loading a module
061   */
062  public BindingModuleLoader(
063      @NonNull IBindingContext bindingContext,
064      @NonNull ModuleLoadingPostProcessor postProcessor) {
065    this.loader = Lazy.lazy(bindingContext::newBoundLoader);
066    this.postProcessor = postProcessor;
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  @NonNull
071  public IBindingContext getBindingContext() {
072    return getLoader().getBindingContext();
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  protected IBindingMetaschemaModule newModule(
077      URI resource,
078      METASCHEMA binding,
079      List<? extends IBindingMetaschemaModule> importedModules)
080      throws MetaschemaException {
081    IBindingContext bindingContext = getLoader().getBindingContext();
082
083    IBindingMetaschemaModule module = new BindingModule(
084        resource,
085        ObjectUtils.notNull(
086            (IBoundDefinitionModelAssembly) bindingContext.getBoundDefinitionForClass(METASCHEMA.class)),
087        binding,
088        importedModules);
089
090    // post-process the module
091    postProcessor.postProcessModule(module, bindingContext);
092    return module;
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  protected List<URI> getImports(METASCHEMA binding) {
097    return ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getImports().stream()
098        .map(Import::getHref)
099        .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList()));
100  }
101
102  @Override
103  protected METASCHEMA parseModule(URI resource) throws IOException {
104    return getLoader().load(METASCHEMA.class, resource);
105  }
106
107  /**
108   * Get the underlying bound loader.
109   *
110   * @return the loader
111   */
112  protected IBoundLoader getLoader() {
113    return ObjectUtils.notNull(loader.get());
114  }
115
116  @Override
117  public boolean isFeatureEnabled(DeserializationFeature<?> feature) {
118    return getLoader().isFeatureEnabled(feature);
119  }
120
121  @Override
122  public Map<DeserializationFeature<?>, Object> getFeatureValues() {
123    return getLoader().getFeatureValues();
124  }
125
126  @Override
127  public IMutableConfiguration<DeserializationFeature<?>>
128      applyConfiguration(IConfiguration<DeserializationFeature<?>> other) {
129    return getLoader().applyConfiguration(other);
130  }
131
132  @Override
133  public IMutableConfiguration<DeserializationFeature<?>> set(DeserializationFeature<?> feature, Object value) {
134    return getLoader().set(feature, value);
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * Allow inline XML entities to be automatically replaced.
139   */
140  @Override
141  public void allowEntityResolution() {
142    enableFeature(DeserializationFeature.DESERIALIZE_XML_ALLOW_ENTITY_RESOLUTION);
143  }
144}
